(:action swing ; Swing an entity to change its state
  :parameters (?entity - object ?target - object)
  :precondition (and (not (at ?entity ?target)) (ready ?entity))
  :effect (and (at ?entity ?target) (not (ready ?entity))

(:action put ; Place an item in a specific position or state
  :parameters (?actor - person ?item - object ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (available ?actor) (not (at ?item ?location)))
  :effect (at ?item ?location)
)

(:action hold ; Hold an entity and update the state accordingly
  :parameters (?agent - person ?entity - object)
  :precondition (and (available ?agent) (not (holding ?agent ?entity)))
  :effect (holding ?agent ?entity)
)

(:action pedal
  ; Pedal a vehicle and alter its movement state
  :parameters (?p - person ?v - vehicle)
  :precondition (and (on ?p ?v) (foot-on-pedal ?p pedal-left) (foot-on-pedal ?p pedal-right) (holding-handlebars ?p ?v) (not (moving ?p ?v)))
  :effect (and (moving ?p ?v) (not (stationary ?p ?v))

(:action stop ; Stop an entity and update its status
  :parameters (?entity - object ?activity - activity)
  :precondition (and (engaged ?entity ?activity))
  :effect (and (not (engaged ?entity ?activity))
